page.title: 17Titchfield Carnival cont...
page.content: society and occupies the time and energy of committee members and other voluntary helpers for much of the year. The carnival season really gets under way early in September with a 'Nomination Dance' at a local hall when contenders for selection as carnival queen come forward.About 20 girls all of whom must be 16 or over and live in the parish,are selected. Those selected go onto a second dance about a fortnight later.The number is then reduced to about 10 from who the queen and her attendents,as well as reserves,are subsequently chosen at a final Grand Ball a few weeks before the big day. Meanwhile, as carnival day approaches the village becomes the centre of bustling activity.There are prizes to be won and much good natured rivalry.
